post.body: Just be careful on your way home cuz'. Happy New Year!!
is that your white rusty dusty car I see parked on the street right now? ;)
Happy New Year to you all!!
Oh, an ex-hooker and a guy who wants to shoot homeless people, that's who.
OMG! The conversation is outerageous. Who are these people??!! :O
Happy New Year! Let 2009 ROCK!
Freezing my ass off! The wind is vicious here!
Loving The Please Touch Museum, but I am SO ready for home!
Not sleeping obviously. :(
Needs to stop spending!! Or needs to find someone who can pay the bills. Ugh.
At KOP waiting to get seated at Bahama Breeze. Trying to enjoy the days this week since my NYE plans tanked. *sigh* for yet another year.
Did no cleaning today. Instead did food shopping and had a lovely birthday dinner with a friend.
Playroom is nice and tidy. Now onto Sonja's room.
Sonja says that today is my day and I can do whatever I want. She's so generous!
Bored, bored, bored. Dying for some conversation. I hope the rest of the week isn't so solitary.
Feeling a bit upset that things never turn out as I imagine them to be. I know it's life, but life can be upsetting sometimes.
At home thinking of the relaxing week ahead. Gotbeatzz - have anytime this week to look at my desktop?
Getting ready for another dental visit and then more playing with Sonja.
Back from a night of much eating and laughing and as always good times. Now, time for bed! Good night.
Santa was a success! She was happier than I thought she'd be. Life is good. :)
